benchmark_details.name: CharacterEval
benchmark_details.overview: CharacterEval is a Chinese benchmark for comprehensive Role-Playing Conversational Agent (RPCA) assessment, supported by a high-quality dataset of multi-turn role-playing dialogues.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive benchmark for evaluating the capabilities of Role-Playing Conversational Agents (RPCAs).

data.source: Created from diverse Chinese novels and scripts, with dialogue extraction aided by GPT-4 and human-quality control.
data.annotation: Manual quality control by human annotators.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on human judgments and compared against models.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores across metrics indicate better performance in RPCA conversational competence.
